DOC.brief_summary: Multicentric, observational, retrospective registry including patients underwent implantable device implantation (pacemaker or ICD) for any indication in the period from 2009 to 2016, followed by remote monitoring. The aims of the registry are to evaluate the occurrence of atrial arrhythmias, of hospitalizations, and the mortality during a long-term follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: Multi-centre Observational Registry on Patients With Implantable Devices Remotely Monitored
DOC.criteria: ICD of pacemaker implantation fo any indication Followed by remote monitoring Age >18 years life expectancy of less than one year
